Prestige Estate Services has several appraisers: Edward Kitson, Elizabeth Lovett Stephanie Calman (from [1]), plus Erika Holycross ([3]). Each may have different specialties within antiques/fine art/etc.

Elizabeth Lovett - same source

Stephanie Calman - same

Erika Holycross - detailed profile in [3]: MFA from Ohio State University; member ISA; USPAP compliant; specializes fine art/antiques/collectibles since transitioning into auction house work then appraisal years ago... Her contact info via phone/email given as per [3].

Ellen Amirkhan: From result[5], certified by ISA & ORRA for oriental rugs... But where is her business located? The ARCS site lists past events speakers so unless stated otherwise maybe assume she‚Äôs based elsewhere unless explicitly linked to ABQ companies like Prestige?

Pricing varies depending on service type: non-regulated ($175/hr), IRS-regulated ($225/hr) per source[8]. Also photo valuations free online according to some sources like Alliances doesn't apply here because they're vehicle-focused).

Albuquerque offers specialized antique appraisal services through experienced professionals adhering to industry standards like USPAP compliance and IRS requirements. Here‚Äôs a curated directory:

---

## **Antique Appraisal Overview**  
Services include valuations for insurance claims, estate settlements/donation tax compliance (**IRS Form 8283**), divorce/inheritance divisions, resale guidance (**market analysis**), and damage/loss documentation. Common specialties span **fine art**, **furniture**, **rugs**, **jewelry**, and collectibles using hybrid methods (**in-person inspections**, remote video assessments).

---

## **Antique Appraisers Directory**

### **Prestige Estate Services**  
*Team Members:*  
- **Edward Kitson**: Generalist focus | Member International Society of Appraisers (ISA) | USPAP-certified  
- **Elizabeth Lovett**: Furniture/decorative arts | ISA member | Over 15 years‚Äô experience  
- **Stephanie Calman**: Fine art/modern collectibles | ASA-accredited | Expertise provenance research  
- **[Erika Holycross](https://prestigeestateservices.com/appraiser/erika-holycross-2/)**: Fine art & rare collectibles | Master‚Äôs degree (Fine Arts) + auction-house background  

*Details:*  
- *Specialties*: Art authentication ‚Ä¢ Antique furniture ‚Ä¢ Oriental rugs ‚Ä¢ Insurance/donation reports ‚Ä¢ Divorce/inheritance valuations  
- *Certifications*: ISA ‚Ä¢ ASA ‚Ä¢ USPAP-compliant reports    
- *Years Active*: Firm established ~2004 (~20 years) / Individual tenures vary    
+ *Contact*:
  300 Menaul Blvd NW #301   
  505-856-9894 / Toll-Free: 844‚Äë378‚Äë7253   
  9 AM‚Äì5 PM MT Mon‚ÄìFri  

---

### **[Mark T. Raney Appraisals LLC](https://www.appraisalsalbuquerque.com)** *(Secondary Option)*
While primarily residential real estate-focused (*SRA designation*), handles partial estates involving antiques via partnerships.
+ *Contact*:
  12231 Academy Rd NE #301   
  505‚Äë856‚Äë9894  

---

## Service Areas & Pricing
### Coverage:
Greater Albuquerque metro area (**Corrales**, Rio Rancho,**Sandia Heights**) + statewide consultations remotely/via travel fees.
### Typical Costs:
| Service Type                | Price Range       |
|-----------------------------|-------------------|
| Non-regulated valuation     | $175/hour         |
| IRS-compliant report         | $225/hour         |
| Photo-based quick estimate    Free ‚Äì $50/item    |

---
For urgent inquiries outside standard hours (*e.g.* probate deadlines), most firms accommodate weekend appointments upon request **(24‚Äì48-hour notice)**

## Directory of Antique Appraisers in Anchorage  

Anchorage hosts a small but specialized community of antique appraisal professionals offering estate evaluations, insurance documentation, auction preparation assistance**,** and collection assessments**. Key providers range from established auction houses** ([1][6]) **to digital-first platforms serving remote regions**.

---

### Notable Antique Appraisal Firms  
#### **Alaska Premier Auctions & Appraisals**  
- **Specialties**: Estate sales**,** fine art**,** historical artifacts**,** jewelry**,** firearms**[^7]**  
- **Years Active**: Founded 2018**[^1]**  
- **Certifications**: USPAP-compliant reports**[^10]**  
- **Contact**: üìç325 W Potter Dr.**,** ‚òéÔ∏è(907)570‚Äë7050 | üïíM‚ÄìF*:*9AM‚Äì5PM*   
The largest auction house statewide*, handling international consignments across categories like Alaskan Native art**[^6]** and mid-century furniture**. Offers free walk-through consultations**[^1]**  

#### **[AppraiseItNow](https://www.appraiseitnow.com)** *(Statewide Coverage)*   
- **Specialties**: Fine art**,** collectibles**, medical equipment*, real estate valuations**[^9]**
